All Classes

Class Description
AttackController
This class handles the action to decide who wons the battle that is Attacker or Defender.
AttackPanelView
This class shows the view for attacking.
Board
This class maintains the data throught the game such as the world map details, player details
BoardView
This is the board view for the risk game which displays the world map in the gui with the selected number of players.
Card
This class specifies the property a particular card possess i.e Territory Name and Card Type
CardType
This enum specifies the types of the card used in the Risk Game
CardTypeTest
This class provides test cases for RiskUtility
Continent
Creation of new Continent and defining features and properties.
ContinentTest
This class provides required test cases for Continent class.
Coordinates
This specifies the x and y coordinates for the territory
DicePanel
This is the panel which provides a user GUI to roll a dice.
DiceType
This enum specifies the types of dice used in the Risk Game
DiceUtility
This class provides the reusable method for dice used in the Risk Game
EditMapController
This class handles the actions that performed in the EditMapView and do the corresponding actions
EditMapView
This class providing the view of the edit map window
FortifyPanelView
This class shows the view for displaying the fortify phase in the game.
GameController
This class provides the single instance of GameController throught the game.
GameControllerTest
This class provides test cases for GameController class.
GamePhase
This is the enum file which specifies the several Game phases in the Risk game
GameScreen
This provides the width and height provied for the frame of the Game play window
GameTest
This class provides test cases for GameController class.
GameUtility
This class provides the reusable method used in the Risk Game.
JunitTestSuite
This is a test suite class for running all the tests in the game.
LoadGameTest
This class provides test cases for Player module.
MainWindowView
This is the main window Frame for the game application.
MapReader
this class read and parse the .map file and set the entities for the game
MapReaderTest
This class provides test cases for MapReader module.
NewGameView
This is the game window for the New Game.
Player
This class is used for player module which contains variables for name of the Player, Armies it has held etc and methods to change the status of the object.
PlayerDiceNumberComparator
This class compares the start dice number for two players to decide who has the greater dice number
PlayerDiceNumberComparatorTest
This class provides required test cases for PlayerDiceNumberComparator class.
PlayerPanelView
This is the panel which displays the player details, the armies each player holds and number of start dice number the player gets.
RiskUtility
This class has the reusable methods to be used in the RISK Game
Score
This class maintains the score of the player in terms of number of territories occupied by player and the number of reinforcements as received by the Player.
ScoreConfiguration
This class provides the data for getting bonus score as per the number of territories occupied by the player.
StartApplication
This is the main class to launch the Risk Game application
Territory
This class gives information about the Territory and methods to set and get its properties
TurnManager
This class manages the turn among the players.When the manager is initialized, it expects a list of player with the dice number they get at the SETUP phase.
TurnManagerTest
This class provides required test cases for TurnManager class.
Unit
This class is used to maintain territories and methods used to store and retrieve information.
ViewUtility
This class provides the reusable methods for the Risk Game view
ViewUtilityTest
This class provides required test cases for ViewUtility class.
World
The class help to build the world and defines the properties to define the world map.
WorldMapPanel
This class creates a WorldMap Panel and draws map with the provided World object.
